channel.title: Personal on Geekosaur
channel.description: Recent content in Personal on Geekosaur

item.title: Personal updates for October (2017)
item.description: After a long time, I’m back with personal updates.

item.title: What Cosplays Do You Like To See At Conventions?
item.description: Recently I’ve attended Aniventure, an anime convention I always enjoy going to, and I noticed one thing: I only took one photo. My wife did take a few: some of us, another with two youtubers (just her and some friends, I was taking the pic) and, of course, the cosplay contest. I’m not usually into taking pictures, and this got me wondering why did I take just that one.

item.title: K-Pop Dump #1
item.description: Lately I’m into K-pop again (I started listening around the 00s), and now I want to share what I’m listening to this week.
